Summary: The event that happened this night occured with 3 spheres also three humanoids practically riding the spheres.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Newburgh

divs: Sighting DetailsOn the night of April 15,2010 at 8:27pm i was riding along in a vehicle on a highway passing a grocery store called Shnuck's.The sky was black with no stars in sight when suddenly three white spherical orbs rushed down hovering from no where about 214 feet off the ground.When i first saw this i thought where those lights came from them the orbs came lower about 25 feet. After about 10 minutes of watching this there was suddenly a 3 second power outage, but when all of the lights from the store came back on beside me one of the orbs started to smoke like a plane does when it has been shot then i noticed that in these luminous orbs where humanoids and i stared to panick. One of the humanoids pointed towards SSW direction and then all three orbs began to gai nquite some altitude then vanished. Once the humanoids vanished i started to think what just happened and if i should tell my friends, but my thoughts were suddenly interupted by the noise of a helicopter and supposable an f-16 military fighter jet that zoomed right over me.Thankfully i got a picture but after the picture was saved into my phone the screen twitched and the picture was immediatly erased.
